releaseNotes:
Easy Workflow Changelog
[2.0.0] - 2025-08-10
New Features
- Added Font Replacer panel to list and replace fonts in compositions.
- Introduced Text Splitter to split text layers into individual words.
- Added Effect Copier to copy/paste effects and keyed transforms.
Improvements
- Enhanced Anchor Point Mover to support time-varying properties.
- Updated UI in Precomp & Center Tools panel with new button layout.
Bug Fixes
- Improved font replacement reliability and effect pasting stability.
